## Description {#details}

Pointer to the context, with optional RAUW support.

Either a raw (non-null) pointer to the <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a></em>, or an owned pointer to <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/replaceablemetadataimpl">ReplaceableMetadataImpl</a></em> (which has a reference to <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a></em>).

Definition at line 972 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.

Assign RAUW support to this.
